column2: Boeing selected for $294 mln deal with Algeria's Tassili Airlines ALGIERS
column3: July 9 Algeria's Tassili Airlines (TA) signed a draft deal on Sunday worth $294 million with U.S. planemaker Boeing for three 737-800 aircraft
column4: Algeria's state news agency APS reported. ~

column2: UPDATE 1-France says Europe should make US companies pay fair share of taxes AIX-EN-PROVENCE
column4: July 9 Time has come for the European Union to make multinationals
column7: pay their fair share of taxes
column8: the French finance minister said on Sunday. ~
